item.title: Covid-19 in Skagit Valley, Wa
item.description: Total daily counts of covid-19 cases, hospitalizations and deaths reported by Skagit Public Health. Cases include total confirmed and presumptive positives, which means that a private lab reported a positive test. Hospitalized are people with positive tests who were hospitalized at any point during their illness. Key events The first case in Skagit Valley was reported on March 10, 2020.

item.title: Introducing hugo-tint
item.description: The Basics This Hugo theme is intended for use with R blogdown. Before starting, see (Allaire et al. 2018) for more info about rmarkdown and (Xie, Thomas, and Hill 2018) for more info about blogdown. Getting Blogdown âŠ•R Console ## Install from CRAN install.packages('blogdown') ## Or, install from GitHub devtools::install_github('rstudio/blogdown') #installs Hugo (works for Windows,macOS, and Linux) blogdown::install_hugo() #initialize a new blog blogdown::new_site() #install theme blogdown::install_theme("mps9506/hugo-tint") Features Block Quotes We know from the Markdown syntax that paragraphs that start with > are converted to block quotes.
